thread.title: Amazing stay
thread.title_full: Amazing stay - Review of Novotel London Blackfriars, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Z2324VRrachel
title: Amazing stay
text:
What an amazing stay as alway Jaqui you are the best hotel manager and a credit to the hotel chain , my parents had an amazing time and loved the room and hospitality . As always the staff are exceptional and I look forward to staying in the future. This is deffinelty a great place and location with a warm welcome from arrival to departure.
Room Tip: Top floors are better views See more room tips
